channel.title: CS2950v on Algorithms for the People
channel.description: Recent content in CS2950v on Algorithms for the People

item.title: Intro & Overview
item.description: In Fall 2019, I taught a course called Crypto for Social Good. I didn’t like the name but I had to make a quick decision and that was the best I could come up with at the time. I had a sense of the topics I wanted to cover but I didn’t have a way to capture the essence of the course. In fact, on the first day of class I told my students:
